text: Fantastic band and worship sessions. Preaching is anointed, encouraging and builds up your faith. Servers are friendly and helpful. Venue is comfy and spacious enough for the crowd.
Planetshakers Church is the best place to be in Singapore. Amazing people, Great atmosphere, God filled place full of miracles and breakthrough.  Who wouldn't want to experience that!!
Iâ€™ve had some of the most powerful and life-changing encounters right here in Planetshakers Church. Also, with such a warm, genuine and God-loving community, thereâ€™s truly no better place to be!!

The best place to be! Love the heart of the church. Everyone is so friendly and welcoming. It is hard to journey with God alone. I am glad to find amazing people to journey alongside with me! Urban Life is awesome

I've never felt more at home and accepted since I stepped into Planetshakers Church when it was still conducting services at Metropolitan YMCA. Joining the church has been one of the best decisions I've made in my life so far; my spiritual life and relationship with God is great, and I love my PS fam!! ðŸ’“
